item.description:
Rawbert Reid is New England's Premier Raw Foods Advocate & Master Chef. Rawbert has over 16 years in rawfood education and 13 years as Chef founder of the 3rd longest running rawfood restaurant in the world, Organic Garden Cafe

Cost: $595 for Full 2 Day Seminar, $300 for either day

Date/Time:
Saturday & Sunday January 26 - 27, 2013, 9:30am to 3:30pm
Snow Dates: Feb 9 & 10

Location:
Chianti Jazz Lounge & Restaurant
(across the street from the Organic Garden Cafe)

Go to our shopping cart to pay AND RESERVE YOUR SPOT! (http://www.e-junkie.com/127434 Best Way)
or CALL 978/922-0004 pay and reserve your seat! *** LIMITED SEATING ***

Download over 16 years of experience in 2 days!
Accelerate your knowledge, skills & MOMENTUM to wellness.
Learn to make the best raw cuisine in the world!


Full 2 days receives -CERTIFICATION OF RAW CHEF BASICS for:
8 hrs of chef training: critical chef skills & theory
· 20+ recipes taught
· raw chef principles for efficiency & safety
· dozens of techniques & equipment handling

4 hrs of raw knowledge: the essentials for radiant health
· nutrition, digestion & detox
· hygiene, beauty & lifestyle

Each workshop has samples throughout AND culminates with an amazing rawfood feast!!


Attendees receive Rawbert's Chef Training Manualwhich includes:
A) all the principles to radiant health and raw nutrition including: Basic Fact's About Raw Plant Foods, Food Combining Guide, quick guide to Ayurveda, The True (Underlying) Causes of Disease, Eating while Traveling,
B) all of the basics of raw chef theory including Sprouting, Dehydration, Measurements And Conversion Guides, Spice Table, Overview Of All Types Of Equipment;
C) dozens of Rawbert and Organic Garden Café's best Gourmet Rawfood Recipes, Rawbert's cooked winter and easy macrobiotic recipes.
D) Fundamental Meal-Planning Ideas, Quick & Easy Snacks

Take advantage of this powerful tool to advance you forward in creating the health and life you've been dreaming about!
Chef Rawbert is dedicated to bringing out the little raw chef in you!


Day 1 - FUNdamentals of Rawfood: 101
· Raw Nutrition Basics & Underlying Causes of Disease
· Alkalizing the body with alkaline foods
· Food Combining Principles
· How to sprout and handle all types of seeds, nuts and grains for recipes
· How to set up your kitchen for gourmet raw food preparation
· Basic measures and equivalents (i.e. teaspoons to tablespoons, ounces to cups, quarts to gallons, etc.)
· What equipment to purchase for your budget; blenders, juicers, food processors & dehydrators
· Knife Cutting techniques: chopping, dicing, mincing, julienning, chiffonade
· Green Juices & smoothies
· Breakfasts
· Soups, sauces & spreads
· Salads & Easy Asian Slaws
· Wrap n roll methods for making great sandwich substitutes
· Easy NON-dehydration desserts
· Tips for simple raw meal planning

Day 2 - Raw & Beyond: 201 Intermediate Chef work with 'Secrets of Dehydration', Seasonal Tips, Tiramisu and much more!
· Understanding Detox, Basic Cleansing Programs
· Principles of Ayurveda and Macrobiotic cooking and how they integrate with a 70% or higher rawfood diet
· Winter & Seasonal Eating Recipes and Tips
· Growing micro-greens & Wheatgrass
· Fermenting foods: nut & seed cheeses, simple pickling & sauerkraut
· Dehydration Theory and Safety
· Working with Spices and food combinations to create your own masterpieces - Understanding spices, flavors and consistencies
· How to convert cooked recipes into raw recipes.
· How to make Granola, Trail Mixes, Snacks
· How to make Crackers, Kale Chips and Pizza Crusts
· How to make savory awesome Sun Burgers & Entree items to delight family
· Fundamental Meal-Planning Ideas for breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks and special occasions
· Raw Chocolate
· Tiramisu Cake (from start to fine finish!)

This is going to be a big class, over 20 people. This makes it even more exciting and you will meet many interesting like-minded people!
item.name: HOME CHEF TRAINING & Healthy Lifestyle Seminar with Rawbert
